name: Tyrant
Lore: 'Assigned to Admiral Ozzel''s Death Squadron. Attempted to capture Rebel starships fleeing the Hoth system.',
Text: 'May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIEs. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1. When using Tractor Beam, adds 1 to destiny draw.',
